content.prompt: Which of the following illustrates how factor demand is related to product demand?

choices.label: The quantity demanded for restaurant meals depends on the price of the meal.
The demand for books depends on the number of authors in the market.
The demand for airline pilots depends on the demand for air travel.
The demand for auto mechanics depends on the supply of auto parts.
The demand for health care depends on the cost of health care.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
